notes: Semiconductor design, manufacturing, packaging, and testing facilities are primary targets; eligible for Chips for Europe Initiative support
Electronics manufacturers using semiconductors are part of supply chain; may benefit from Integrated Production Facilities and Open EU Foundries
Automotive sector heavily dependent on semiconductor supply; subject to crisis monitoring and alert mechanisms for supply disruptions
Data centers, telecom infrastructure, and cloud providers are key consumers; may participate in European chips infrastructure initiatives
Smart grid and renewable energy systems depend on semiconductors; subject to supply chain monitoring
Medical devices use semiconductors; subject to crisis response mechanisms during shortages
Financial services are semiconductor users, not producers; not subject to Chips Act requirements
Public sector is a semiconductor consumer; may participate in governance (European Semiconductor Board) but not subject to production requirements
